author: Boon S.
comment: I'm amaze how quickly developer fixed Android 2.0 issue after I report the bug error message. Definately worth to spend money with this app.

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Thank you :-{)

author: Jen Beattie
comment: If you can't get the app to sync with your watch leave it a day or so. Worked for me after I reset my watch back to factory. Happy days! Thanks guys!

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hi Jen, , I guess you are facing a sync issue between your phone and watch, you can try to resync all apps in the android wear app (settings / your watch / resync all apps). Best regards :-{)

author: Robert Killen
comment: Just would not show on watch even after 're boot 're install and left it for 24 hours to see if it would sync... it did not. Watch is LG Urbane and phone is s7 ☹  After a response from the dev I tried again to install.. SUCCESS!!! Thank you so much.

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hi  Robert, I just released a new version (3.8) that fixes the installation on Android Wear 2.0, check it out :-{)

author: Sid Promyotin
comment: Battery optimization beats all other similar watch faces by 30-50%! Would love to see the option to add a third complication for a second time zone.

author: UT Fong
comment: Watch face will not sync LG G. Even after factory reset several times

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hi, I guess you are facing a sync issue between your phone and watch, you can try to resync all apps in the android wear app (settings / your watch / resync all apps). Best regards :-{)

author: Derek Martin
comment: I would rate 5/5 but it longer works on my 1st Gen Moto 360  Edit: Dev helped me fix my issue very pleased with this app

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hi Derek, can you tell me more about the issue ? I still run the watchface on a 1st gen LG G watch, so it should definitely work your Moto 360 :-{)

author: Nam Tăng
comment: Great watch face! Lots of customisation and great design! I would like though for it to have custom watch badges, maybe select your own bitmap to use?

author: Jayen Panchal
comment: This developer got some amazing watch faces. They look great on my Ticwatch E. Hope to see a new update for Android Wear 2.0

author: Anthony Chavez
comment: Really fond of the simplicity and look. Although I wish I could change what information the watch displays. Unless I just can't find it then nevermind.

author: Tom Sturge
comment: Watchface looks great. Would love to be able to hide the seconds hand and just have the hour and minute hands

author: Dan Villanueva
comment: Very nice; however, step counter isn't syncing.

author: Zachary Brooks
comment: Great choices of themes and colors. The different mustaches that you can choose is my favorite part. I like the circle graphs around the phone, watch, and steps indicators, but I don't understand what it means around the weather indicator. The tap feature between date/time and temp/steps works very smooth. Adding in the ability to open up apps by taping and indicator was a great idea. GET THIS WATCH FACE!

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Thanks a lot Zachary  :-{)

title: I love this watch face

author: Dave Campbell
comment: This is a stunning looking watch face. It has so many options, and the premium mode is fantastic with a great price attached to it. My only issue that I have, and I would like to stop the second hand ticking all the time... I do not know if this can be done or not though. Overall worth 5 stars

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hi Dave, thanks for your feedback ! You can set the second hand to smooth in the settings  :)

title: Beautiful!

author: Ciitrus
comment: I'm using a nexus 5x on android 7.1.1 and a Huawei watch on the latest version. I've used it before on an lg and Moto watch. An amazing watchface. Just helps when it works.  I've resynced the apps a good fifteen times. Other watchfaces install but it looks like a lot of apps don't. The watch has been unpaired and resynced numerous times.

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hello, it should work on your huawei watch, can you tell me what is not working ? Is the watch face displayed in the Android Wear app on your phone ? Can you try to resync all apps ? Best regards :)

title: Won't work with my Huawei w1

author: Vincent Mendes
comment: Just paid for this and it won't customize on my LG sport watch. Nothing from my phone syncs to my watch, and there is no option on the watch itself to customize. Would love to rate 5 stars if it worked. **Update** randomly synced over night, loving it! But the weather part does not work on my watch. Is there a special weather app I need downloaded?

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hi Vincent, thanks for your update. I'm working on a fix for the weather app link. Best regards :-{)

author: Jordan Jadrien
comment: I love this app. It is the cleanest group of watchfaces I have found.  I would like to see one thing implemented though- After changing the watchface or any settings, it does not update on the watch instantly. I've seen other apps be able to do this. I would like to see some "push changes to watch" action. Since being on Wear 2.0, I'm not sure if it is an issue now, but changes don't even reflect on the watchface, it seems. I'm stuck with the default white face. Thanks for any feedback on this thought. Edit: The face finally updated after ~15 minutes or so.

author: Alexander Damyanov
comment: Hello! Great work with the watch face, but I have an issue with the installation. I unpaired my devices and I can't seem to install this watch face again. Tried with the resync and multiple reboots of both devices and nothing helps. UPDATE: Everything is fine, seems it just needed more time to update everything.
title: Unable to install on watch

author: Dustin Kwee
comment: Very clean design! However, the steps indicator doesn't seem to be working when I press it. Also, I think the weather indicator should be changed - a graph around it doesn't exactly tell the weather. Perhaps options to customize what apps get opened when pressing the indicator would be great.

author: Behnam Merabiani
comment: It won't install on my Moto 360. Bought premium, too. 1 stars until they fix it, or someone tells me how to fix it.  So, I've tried unsyncing and resyncing at least 6 times, in a varied amounts of ways, and every app, EXCEPT THIS ONE, syncs.                                                                                                              UPDATE: Turn off wifi. I have no idea why this is causing the problem, but you need to turn off the watch's wifi, and it'll appear.

author: Jock Turner
comment: Hey I have downloaded it and purchased Premium as I love the design and options. However it is not appearing in android ware for use. I have restarted my phone multiple times, restarted my watch, resynced, factory formatted my watch and non of it appears to be working. Do you know anything about this or why?  I would love to use the watch face and it's dissapointing to have so much trouble with it

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hi  Jock, I just released a new version (3.8) that fixes the installation on Android Wear 2.0, check it out :-{)

author: James Shand
comment: Love the option for different logos at the bottom and the night modes Edit:  doesn't work anymore. Started crashing my watch then when I tried uninstalling then reinstalling it it wouldn't load on the app. Please help.

author: R Dyer
comment: Weather feature not working with Huawei watch. Option to change font size and colour would be much better and phone battery display is not synced to actual battery levels. No real benefit to paying for premium

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hello, I just released a new version (3.8) that fixes the weather link, check it out :-{)

author: MadMac
comment: Installed and paid for premium but watch faces never appear on the watch and changes in the app don't get saved. Tried to sync and resync apps on the watch and uninstalling and reinstalling but still doesn't work.

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hello, I suggest you uninstall the app on your phone, wait for the app to be uninstalled on your watch (very important, reboot the watch if necessary), then reinstall the app. Tell me if it works :)

title: Doesn't work. Sony Smartwatch 3

author: Hunter Nannen
comment: No matter what i do i can not make any badge pop up with the watch face on my moto 360 2nd gen any suggestions? It didnt work i think its the app. Thay didnt work either im giving up @developer

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: I'm sorry to hear that, it's an Android Wear issue : sync between phone and watch :/ you can try to resync all apps from the android wear app on your phone, then wait for all apps to be resynced (it can take a while).

title: The whole cool thing is the badge but it wont work

author: Adrian Cavanagh
comment: The trouble with a lot of AW watchfaces is that they try and look like a real analog watchface, when it isn't a real analog watch. Makes your smartwatch look like a toy. This gets the balance right in looking a bit digital but also with a touch of old watch class. Very well done.

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Thanks a lot Adrian  :-{)

title: Classy

author: John Tickle
comment: Nice looking watch face, and nice premium options, however it doesn't seem to update on the watch when you change the face on the app. I have to change the watch face settings, then change to another watch face entirely, then back to this one for the changes I've made to work. Fix this and I'll be using this face all the time

author: Javi Oropeza
comment: Love this watch face. The best. So I was having trouble installing the watch face. It was on my phone but couldn't select it on my watch. I had to go to the play store on my watch and scroll down. It displays the apps on my phone. Found it then download it. Easy.

author: Mohd Afdhal Mohd Zaed
comment: No update for a very long time..and i bought this app! So disappointing! At least update it with a new theme!

author: Oren Kosto
comment: Stunning watch face, and the premium features cost almost nothing. Although, I would love to be able to position all of the complications on one page instead of having to flip between two...

author: Cassidy Williams
comment: Worked great, but now the weather option isn't work. Says that there is an error. Emailed and haven't heard anything :\

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hello Cassidy, I just released a new version (3.8) that fixes the weather link, check it out :-{)

author: Scott Windham
comment: Nice watch face. Seems not to work with Android 7. Not able to see it on my moto360 After updating to Android 7.  Samsung Galaxy S7

author: Daniel Fitzgerald
comment: Great but room for improvement.  Maybe an option to make "custom themes" such as selectable background from colour or image. Or mix-and-match components from the themes, like the yellow hands from one theme, onto the green background of another.  Also, a programmable app shortcut would be excellent, such as a portion of screen that can be programmed to allow the user to open a specific app of their choice.

author: Donna Jordan
comment: Would like to have a cross as one of the badges, but you won't find a prettier, more customizable face for the price. Use it all the time. Love it!

author: Szakál Balázs
comment: Seems like restarting phone and recreating Bluetooth pairing fixed it finally. The app does what it's for, would enjoy some more skins in the free version, maybe then I could decide if I want to buy also.

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hi Szakal, thanks for the update and thanks for the feedback  :)

title: Finally successfully installed

author: Animesh Patni
comment: I am using 6P and Moto 360 2nd Gen and I bought your premium version too but the watch face is not showing on my android wear faces as well as on my watch. I resynced all my apps even upaired and paired the watch again, still nothong. Help me out

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hello, I suggest you uninstall the app on your phone, wait for the app to be uninstalled on your watch (very important, reboot the watch if necessary), then reinstall the app. Tell me if it works :)

title: Not able to connect to my Moto 360 2nd Gen

author: shaival chokshi
comment: Great app, very less battery consumption. But can you please include custom badges ?? That'd be awesome !!
title: Fantastic work, looks nice !

author: Galvin
comment: I've been using it for a while now, but when i reset my watch it suddenly stop working. The things i change won't be saved, and the face doesn't show on the android wear even though i have resync the apps many times already. Not sure what is going on. Please help.

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hello, I guess the app on your phone and the app on your watch didn't get updated at the same time (same version). So I suggest you uninstall the app on your phone, wait for the app to be uninstalled on your watch (very important, reboot the watch if necessary), then reinstall the app. Tell me if it works :)

title: Can't use it

author: Dan Willman
comment: Updating review as the issue with launching on my wear was my own. Now that I've been able to use it a bit I think this is definitely one of my favorite watch faces. Nice balance of simplicity and functionality and the built-in​ themes are well made.

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Thanks for the update Dan ! I leave the original answer here to help others : Hi Dan, on Android Wear 2.0 you might need to open the Play Store app on your watch, and at the bottom of the first screen choose the apps on your phone that you want to use on your watch, press the download button on the right of Mustache Watch Face. Best regards :-{)

author: mohammed Shainsha
comment: Changes made to watchface in phone is not getting updated on my Moto360 2nd gen. Useless without syncing not working.

reply.author: The Hoodie Studio
reply.content: Hi Mohammed, I guess you are facing a sync issue between your phone and watch, you can try to resync all apps in the android wear app (settings / your watch / resync all apps). Best regards :-{)

author: Bazz Inga
comment: This is the best watch face i can find ... Love the sunglasses badge would like more badges and the option to such the minute markers around the edge .But apart from that it's truly worth it
